Beautiful XV century historic estate in rural area of Santa Maria with mountain views. Plot of approx. 1,000,000 m2, built area of approx. 5,500 m2, several buildings among which we find the house of lords, the staff house, chapel, old mill, stables, barns, warehouses. The main house has 12 bedrooms, 7 bathrooms, spacious living rooms, dining room, kitchen.

Fantastic country house with one of the best views you can find in Mallorca, situated on the outskirts of Deià, overlooking the sea, the mountains and the village, especially nice at night when the church is illuminated. The house is in perfect condition, with large terraces ideal to enjoy this magical place. Ideal for those looking for a unique place to enjoy the view, the peace and proximity to the charming village of Deiá (only 5 minutes), 15 minutes to Soller and 40 minutes to Palma.
